alert.note: Alert for East Marshall; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 4:26PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Marshall, northeastern Red Lake, west central Beltrami, Pennington and northwestern Clearwater Counties through 500 PM CDT... At 426 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Rosewood to near Plummer. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Thief River Falls, Plummer, St. Hilaire, Grygla, Goodridge, Gatzke and Rosewood. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: East Marshall; North Beltrami; North Clearwater; Pennington; Red Lake
